ack.p: We are grateful to Ken Komatsu and Kristen Herrick for their assistance with data access, and to Trevor Bedford for assistance accessing and interpreting antigenic distance data from Nextstrain. We thank Lone Simonsen for helpful discussions.

sec.title: Code and data availability
sec.p: Code to perform all reported analyses and construct all plots, and all relevant data (Arizona surveillance data and relevant antigenic advance data) is archived at https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/160883450.

sec.title: Disclaimer
sec.p: This work does not necessarily represent the views of the US government or the NIH.
